entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.4°C

Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Saturday: Rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then rain. Rain mixed with snow this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
